long_description: The body-hugging Patagonia Active Hipster briefs offer moisture-managing comfort during active sports and everyday wear. Quick-drying fabric offers easy care, high recycled content and superior moisture transfer. Extra-wide waistband lies flat and won't roll or bind, preventing irritation. Soft, chafe-free leg openings stay in place and won't creep up. Breathable mini-rib crotch. The Patagonia Active Hipster briefs are formfitting. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia.
short_description: The body-hugging Patagonia Active Hipster briefs offer moisture-managing comfort during active sports and everyday wear.
